page.title: 06BIOGRAPHY
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A HOUSEWIFE A typical day in Mrs Dillons life is getting up at 7.00am. She gets every_body ready for school then gets the childrens breakfast ready and washes up and tidies up by 8.15am. Then she gets the bike out of the garage walks down to school drops all the children off at school. Then she cycles up to the university she works in the library until 12.15pm and goes home for a quick coffee and cycles back to school to see if Gerard goes back into class. Then she goes shopping or visiting she might watch a bit of tennis and goes to collect Gerard from school.Then she gets the tea ready. If anyone wants dropping off any where like Brownies or tennis she takes them in the car.She might go to a meeting,or watch T.V.if lucky.
